definition: to nurse a grievance/to harbor a grudge
to harbor a grudge with deep-seated hatred (idiom)

sentences.english: The make the night nurse a grievance of is what person?
sentences.chinese: 那个叫夜饮恨的是什么人？

sentences.english: Liverpool have won their last two meetings with Manchester United at Anfield.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦最近两次在安菲尔德都让曼狗饮恨而归。

definition: (literary) to be routed (in a war)/to suffer defeat (in sports etc)
to suffer a defeat/to fail/to fall behind
to suffer the painful loss of (a loved one etc)/to miss out on (an opportunity)/to fail to gain (victory etc)
to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure/to fall at the last hurdle/snatching defeat from the jaws of victory
lit. to ruin the enterprise for the sake of one basketful/to fail through lack of a final effort/to spoil the ship for a ha'penny worth of tar (idiom)
to kill with one's own hand
to return in low spirits following a defeat or failure to achieve one's ambitions (idiom)
